sentences.en: According to such layered structure three open source frameworks , Tapestry , Spring and Hibernate, are briefly introduced in this paper.
sentences.cn: 按照这种分层结构, 分别介绍了Tapestry, Spring和Hibernate三种开源框架.

sentences.en: Data base operation having applied Hibernate simplification.
sentences.cn: 应用Hibernate简化了数据库操作.

sentences.en: Don't hibernate in your office no matter how busy you are.
sentences.cn: 不管有多忙也不要在办公室睡觉.

sentences.en: Dormice hibernate from October to May.
He's trying to fatten Dan up so they can hibernate together.
sentences.cn: 它想把丹喂得胖胖的,陪它一起冬眠!

sentences.en: In cool weather, serpents do not tempt; they grow diffident, recede and hibernate.
sentences.cn: 在凉爽的天气里, 蛇是不会出来引诱人的, 它会胆怯 、 退避,还要冬眠.

sentences.en: In the cold weather some of them hibernate.
sentences.cn: 它们有的在严寒的天气冬眠了.

sentences.en: In the Hibernate mapping file, by Configure the lazy attribute to determine the search strategy.
sentences.cn: 在Hibernate映射文件中, 通过在上配置lazy属性来确定检索策略.

sentences.en: In winter bears usually hibernate in their dens.
sentences.cn: 冬天熊通常在穴里冬眠.

sentences.en: Some animals, including some bears, only half hibernate.
sentences.cn: 有些动物, 包括有些熊只是半冬眠.

sentences.en: Some endotherms do not need to hibernate.
sentences.cn: 一些温血动物不需要冬眠。

sentences.en: Some warm - blooded animals do not need to hibernate.
sentences.cn: 一些温血动物不需要冬眠.

sentences.en: Struts and Hibernate are open source frameworks and commonly used.
sentences.cn: 其中比较流行的就有开放源码的Struts框架和Hibernate框架.

sentences.en: The documents include, HIBERNATE configuration, the one - to - many. many - to - many . another is usually more of its own operations.
sentences.cn: 更不用说了,我培训期间的资料,包括每天老师的例子.文件主要包括, HIBERNATE的 配置, 一对多, 多对多. 别的就是些平时的自己作业.

trans.tran_en: if an animal hibernates, it sleeps for the whole winter
